title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Population pressure and finite Non-renewal Resources. Growing problems of developed and developing economies. Carrying capacity of Earth. Environmental perspective of development, Mining dumps, Disposal of Wastes, Pollution of free open access resources, like water and air. Conventional Energy sources and their implications of use. Renewal energy sources and biomass energy sources. Energy conservation and efficiency improvement. Life Cycle costs, Absence of Internalization of preservation costs. Performance perspective of development, New pathways for sustainable development, concept of industrial ecology, molecular manufacturing, efficient energy generation, energy efficient use, cleaner transportation, cleanup biotechnology, improved materials, conservation of resources and materials, recycling and reuse, waste minimization and controlling emissions, energy management.
